hero.title: Disaster Recovery & Restoration Services
hero.description: Rapid emergency response for water damage, fire damage, and more.

items.description: When disaster strikes your home or business, every minute counts. Dilamco provides emergency response services throughout Montreal and surrounding areas to quickly address water damage, fire damage, and other disaster situations.

Our experienced team arrives promptly with specialized equipment to assess the damage and begin immediate mitigation efforts. We work efficiently to prevent further damage and start the restoration process as quickly as possible.
From emergency water extraction to fire damage cleanup, our comprehensive disaster recovery services help Montreal property owners get back to normal after unexpected events.

items.title: Water Damage Restoration
items.description: Fast response to flooding, burst pipes, sewage backups, and water intrusion. We extract water, dry structures, and restore damaged areas with professional equipment.

items.title: Fire and Smoke Damage Repair
items.description: Comprehensive cleanup and restoration after fire damage. We remove soot, eliminate persistent odors, and rebuild damaged structures to the highest standards.

items.title: Mold Remediation & Decontamination
items.description: Safe removal of mold and contaminants following water damage. We identify and eliminate mold sources to protect your health and your family's wellbeing.

items.title: 24/7 Emergency Response
items.description: Availability for emergency situations with rapid water extraction, immediate drying, and comprehensive documentation for insurance claims. Guaranteed response in the shortest time possible.

items.title: Insurance Claims Assistance
items.description: Detailed damage documentation, accurate estimates, and direct communication with your insurance company to simplify the claims process and maximize your compensation.

items.title: Complete Restoration
items.description: Complete reconstruction and restoration of your property to its pre-disaster condition, including all necessary finishing and restoration work.
